Biden: s tax plan includes provisions such as imposing a payroll tax on earnings over $400,000, restoring a top income tax rate of 39.6% for income above $400,000, and increasing the top corporate tax rate from 21% to 28%.
Independent tax analysts say Biden: s plan to raise corporate taxes will indirectly affect employees due to lower investment returns or lower wages over time.
The Penn Wharton Budget Model analysis f: but instead of seeing their taxes go up directly, those additional families are paying the corporate tax hikes in the form of lower investment returns or lower wages over time.
